data.label: Do I have to register to use e...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
Do I have to register to use eFileCA? Yes, all users must register with an electronic service provider (EFSP) prior to using e-filing.
data.full_text: Do I have to register to use eFileCA? Yes, all users must register with an electronic service provider (EFSP) prior to using e-filing.

data.label: What time do I have to submit ...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
What time do I have to submit my document to have it deemed filed the same day? The filing must be received by the court by 5 p.
data.full_text: What time do I have to submit my document to have it deemed filed the same day? The filing must be received by the court by 5 p.

data.label: Can I upload all documents tog...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
Can I upload all documents together or must they be separated? Documents should be filed as you would have at the clerk window.
data.full_text: Can I upload all documents together or must they be separated? Documents should be filed as you would have at the clerk window.

data.label: 256(b)(3), a document filed el...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
256(b)(3), a document filed electronically must be text searchable.
data.full_text: 256(b)(3), a document filed electronically must be text searchable.

data.label: How do I serve other individua...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
How do I serve other individuals with my e-filed documents? Filers are responsible for accomplishing service of all filings as required by applicable court rules.
data.full_text: How do I serve other individuals with my e-filed documents? Filers are responsible for accomplishing service of all filings as required by applicable court rules.

data.label: Filings submitted without all ...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
Filings submitted without all the required filing fees, will be rejected for correction.
data.full_text: Filings submitted without all the required filing fees, will be rejected for correction.

data.label: Filings submitted electronical...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement

data.full_text: Filings submitted electronically will be rejected if they are submitted without all the required filing fees.

data.label:

ADR (Mediation)
Alternative Dispute Resolution ("ADR" for short) is the term used for multiple different ways to resolve disagreements outside of court.
data.full_text:
ADR (Mediation)
Alternative Dispute Resolution ("ADR" for short) is the term used for multiple different ways to resolve disagreements outside of court.

data.label: ADR include mediation, arbitra...
data.title:
Procedure Requirement
ADR include mediation, arbitration, neutral evaluation, the use of special masters and referees, binding arbitration, facilitation, and settlement conferences.
data.full_text: ADR include mediation, arbitration, neutral evaluation, the use of special masters and referees, binding arbitration, facilitation, and settlement conferences.

data.label:
Discovery Facilitator Program
...
data.title:
Procedure Requirement
Discovery Facilitator Program
The Discovery Facilitator Program (DFP) provides parties an opportunity to resolve their discovery issues with the assistance of a neutral, experienced litigation attorney, in a manner that is more cost-effective, efficient, and participant-controlled than a standard discovery motion, and that avoids the risk of sanctions inherent in formal discovery motion practice.
data.full_text:
Discovery Facilitator Program
The Discovery Facilitator Program (DFP) provides parties an opportunity to resolve their discovery issues with the assistance of a neutral, experienced litigation attorney, in a manner that is more cost-effective, efficient, and participant-controlled than a standard discovery motion, and that avoids the risk of sanctions inherent in formal discovery motion practice.

data.label: The interpreter must be able t...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
The interpreter must be able to handle the widest range of language terms that might be presented in the courts, everything from specialized legal and technical terminology to street slang.

data.label: The level of expertise require...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
The level of expertise required for this profession is far greater than that required for everyday bilingual conversation.
data.full_text: The level of expertise required for this profession is far greater than that required for everyday bilingual conversation.

data.label: Requests must be received five...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
Requests must be received five business days in advance of the hearing, with the exceptions listed below: Generally, any media outlet wishing to record a 1:30 p.
data.full_text: Requests must be received five business days in advance of the hearing, with the exceptions listed below: Generally, any media outlet wishing to record a 1:30 p.

data.label: felony arraignment at any one ...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
felony arraignment at any one of our three criminal courthouses (Hall of Justice, Palo Alto and Morgan Hill) must submit their request no later than 11:30 a.
data.full_text: felony arraignment at any one of our three criminal courthouses (Hall of Justice, Palo Alto and Morgan Hill) must submit their request no later than 11:30 a.

data.full_text: Sketch artists are not required to obtain permission prior to coming to Court and sketching images.

data.label: For certain hearings you must ...

Compliance Requirement
For certain hearings you must ask the court for permission to appear remotely.

data.label: You must also serve all partie...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
You must also serve all parties with a blank RA-015 [Opposition to Remote Proceeding].
data.full_text: You must also serve all parties with a blank RA-015 [Opposition to Remote Proceeding].

data.label: Your request must be made at l...
data.title:
Compliance Requirement
Your request must be made at least 15 days prior to your hearing and you must provide notice to all parties.
data.full_text: Your request must be made at least 15 days prior to your hearing and you must provide notice to all parties.

data.label: If you do not request and rece...

Compliance Requirement

data.title:

data.label: Parties are cautioned that fai...
